title: TPL - Total Player Sports logo
content:
Can anyone ID this sport font?  
It's sort of similar to a bold condensed Univers or Helvetica, but the rounded off left sides of the R & P throw me for a loop!!  
Much thanks in advance!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [TPS Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121109061013/http:/typophile.com/files/TPS%20Logo.jpg) | 35.87 KB |
author: dunnyman

comments.content:
It could be Larabie's [Carbon Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20121109061013/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/carbon/block/), stretched and skewed.

- Lex
